Package geometry

Class Segment

java.lang.Object
geometry.Segment
public class Segment extends Object
Class stores two points that represent a line segment
Version:
3.0 22/04/2023
Author:
Alexandre Rodrigues, Miguel Cabrita and Afonso Rio
